survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients who have used telemedicine services to assess their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: Which of the following telemedicine platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following telemedicine platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall telemedicine experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall telemedicine experience?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent telemedicine visit?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent telemedicine visit?

questions.question_text: How easy was it to schedule your telemedicine appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question to measure ease of scheduling.

script.question_text: How easy was it to schedule your telemedicine appointment?

questions.question_text: Were you able to resolve your medical concern through telemedicine?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to assess effectiveness.

script.question_text: Were you able to resolve your medical concern through telemedicine?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the audio and video quality during your telemedicine session?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question to measure technical quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the audio and video quality during your telemedicine session?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during your telemedicine session?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to identify technical issues.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during your telemedicine session?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical difficulties you experienced.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field for detailed feedback on technical issues.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical difficulties you experienced.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use telemedicine services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question to measure future usage intentions.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use telemedicine services again in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telemedicine services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback for improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telemedicine services?
